name: Hospital Simulation Demo
description:
Hospital sim game demo which using "Goal Oriented Action Planning" mechanics, was created from the frame of the Advanced AI Course by Penney de Byl from Udemy, you want to manage your flow of the hospital routine, for that you need to take care of the toilets and the treatment cubicles for maintaining a normal routine in your hospital.

Controls: Move the Camera with the WASD keys, Rotate the Camera using C and Z keys, zoom in and Out with R and F keys, Change the Camera Angle with T and G keys, on the bottom menu you can click on an object you want to put on the map, and drag it wherever you want to put the object, if you want to delete an object you should drag it with a mouse click and put it in the bin.
